meta.title: From CHARLIE to BROWN
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: A murder has been committed at our Halloween party! Seven witnesses (in costume) have given testimony, in the form of Raddles. Our fifth witness is Charlie Brown, who can barely handle all this not-so-good grief. His hint: something suspicious is appearing in some of these Raddle clues. [Update: the solution [can be found here](/mystery/whodunit)]
